comment1: Jan really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.
comment2: Jan was a top team colleague at DA. His positive commitment and willingness to take on responsibility made a significant contribution to us achieving our goals.
comment3: It was a great pleasure to work with Jan. He knows how to push and encourage team members to present the best work possible, always adding something to brainstorm. Regarding the well-being of group members, he was always present and available to listen and help others, with a great sense of humor as well.
ppEnd: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contactText: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
portfolioText: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
